Title: Tavis Goldwire
Content: Hello! I'm Tavis. I am currently pursuing my Master's in Zoology at the University of Florida, where my research focuses on the complex, invisible world of microbiomes. I started Goldwire Games with a simple hypothesis: Board games are the perfect medium to teach systems thinking.

Title: Scientific Accuracy
Content: No made-up stats. Every species ability in Trophic is derived from its actual biological niche and behavioral ecology.

Title: Conservation
Content: We put our money where our mouth is. 20% of all profits go directly to preserving the habitats you play on the board.

Title: Education
Content: Designed to be accessible for families but deep enough for classrooms. We are building curriculum guides to accompany the game.

Title: Is this game suitable for kids?
Content: Absolutely. While the strategy runs deep
Image: the core mechanics are intuitive. We recommend it for ages 10+
Icon: but younger nature lovers often catch on quickly!

Title: When is the Kickstarter launching?
Content: We are finalizing the artwork for the Rainforest expansion now. Sign up on the Home page to get the exact launch date alert.

Title: Does the game feature microorganisms?
Content: Yes! Given Tavis's background in microbiomes
Image: we include ""Decomposer"" and ""Microbe"" cards that are essential for nutrient cycling in the game.
